name: Frozen Chateau
description:
This game was built to be a prototype for testing out a few game ideas and assets for a sort of 2D Zelda and Souls-like hybrid game set in a world of anthro/furry characters.

The art and code I made myself, however the SFX are from ALttP and the music is from KF4. I don't have a license to use these but this game is just meant to be more of a proof of concept for an idea rather than anything official.

I'm still fleshing out the ideas for it so feedback is encouraged and welcome.
